name: Intertwined (Yukine)
description:
Intertwined is a Homoerotic Furry-based Visual Novel that revolves around the main playable character who is attending Thornewood University. Thornewood University is the first school in the country to become an all canine school and is one of the highest revered due to their special major programs. Melmond is a first year student who will dive into the world of uncertainty with his own love life, stress of being a student, and some unknown forces. They will tackle ghosts of their past as well as meet and learn the pasts of their friends. 

As you deep dive into the journey ahead you’ll quickly learn it is paved with happiness, sadness, and other unfathomable circumstances. Will you be able to piece together the puzzle of his past while saving your friends? Or will the pain and anguish that you’ve kept hidden overtake you?

Only time will tell.
Only fate can answer. 

Only the cosmos will become … intertwined.

Cast

and more....

Next Update : TBD

Intertwined is an episodic Visual Novel which will be released monthly. We will do our best to make sure that we release on time each month, but we developers wish to focus more on quality than anything. If an update is delayed please see to our devlogs as we will do our best to keep our viewers informed of any release changes.

If you wish to support the game, we will have ways to do that here soon. For now though please enjoy the introduction and day 1 of the game and if you have any questions or concerns please comment below and we will do our best to remedy those!
